tika-vin05t13:1_0: 69.Dānavissāsaggāhehilābhassa pariṇāmananti ettha tāva dānanti attano santakassa
tika-vin05t13:1_1: cīvarādiparikkhārassa saddhivihārikādīsu yassa kassaci dānaṁ. Tatridaṁ dānalakkhaṇaṁ
tika-vin05t13:1_2: – “idaṁ tuyhaṁ demi dadāmi dajjāmi oṇojemi pariccajāmi vissajjāmī”ti vā “itthannāmassa
tika-vin05t13:1_3: demi…pe… vissajjāmī”ti vā vadati, sammukhāpi parammukhāpi dinnaṁyeva hoti. “Tuyhaṁ
tika-vin05t13:1_4: gaṇhāhī”ti vutte “mayhaṁ gaṇhāmī”ti vadati, sudinnaṁ suggahitañca. “Tava santakaṁ
tika-vin05t13:1_5: karohi, tava santakaṁ hotu, tava santakaṁ hotī”ti vutte “mama santakaṁ karomi, mama
tika-vin05t13:1_6: santakaṁ hotu, mama santakaṁ karissāmī”ti vadati, dudinnaṁ duggahitañca. Neva dātā
tika-vin05t13:1_7: dātuṁ jānāti, na itaro gahetuṁ, sace pana “tava santakaṁ karohī”ti vutte “sādhu,
tika-vin05t13:1_8: bhante, mayhaṁ gaṇhāmī”ti gaṇhāti, suggahitaṁ. Sace pana eko “idaṁ cīvaraṁ gaṇhāhī”ti
tika-vin05t13:1_9: vadati, itaro “na gaṇhāmī”ti vadati, puna so “dinnaṁ mayā tuyhaṁ, gaṇhāhī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t13:1_10: itaropi “na mayhaṁ iminā attho”ti vadati, tato purimopi “mayā dinna”nti dasāhaṁ atikkāmeti,
tika-vin05t13:1_11: pacchimopi “mayā paṭikkhitta”nti, kassa āpattīti? Na kassaci. Yassa pana ruccati,
tika-vin05t13:1_12: tena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṁ. “Itthannāmassa dehī”ti dinnaṁ yāva parassa hatthaṁ
tika-vin05t13:1_13: na pāpuṇāti, tāva yo pahiṇati, tasseva santakaṁ, “itthannāmassa dammī”ti dinnaṁ pana
tika-vin05t13:1_14: yassa pahīyati, tassa santakaṁ. Tasmā bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṁ pahiṇati
tika-vin05t13:1_15: “idaṁ cīvaraṁ itthannāmassa dehī”ti. So antarāmagge yo pahiṇati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t13:1_16: suggahitaṁ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, duggahitaṁ.
tika-vin05t13:2_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṁ pahiṇati “imaṁ cīvaraṁ itthannāmassa dehī”ti. So
tika-vin05t13:2_1: antarāmagge suṇāti “yo pahiṇati, so kālakato”ti, tassa matakacīvaraṁ adhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin05t13:2_2: svādhiṭṭhitaṁ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, duggahitaṁ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa
tika-vin05t13:2_3: hatthe cīvaraṁ pahiṇati “imaṁ cīvaraṁ itthannāmassa dehī”ti. So antarāmagge suṇāti
tika-vin05t13:2_4: “yassa pahīyati, so kālakato”ti, tassa matakacīvaraṁ adhiṭṭhāti, dvādhiṭṭhitaṁ. Yo
tika-vin05t13:2_5: pahiṇati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, suggahitaṁ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṁ pahiṇati
tika-vin05t13:2_6: “imaṁ cīvaraṁ itthannāmassa dehī”ti. So antarāmagge suṇāti “ubho kālakatā”ti, yo
tika-vin05t13:2_7: pahiṇati, tassa matakacīvaraṁ adhiṭṭhāti, svādhiṭṭhitaṁ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa matakacīvaraṁ
tika-vin05t13:2_8: adhiṭṭhāti, dvādhiṭṭhitaṁ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṁ pahiṇati “imaṁ cīvaraṁ
tika-vin05t13:2_9: itthannāmassa dammī”ti. So antarāmagge yo pahiṇati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, duggahitaṁ.
tika-vin05t13:2_10: Yassa pahīyati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, suggahitaṁ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṁ
tika-vin05t13:2_11: pahiṇati “imaṁ cīvaraṁ itthannāmassa dammī”ti. So antarāmagge suṇāti “yo pahiṇati,
tika-vin05t13:2_12: so kālakato”ti, tassa matakacīvaraṁ adhiṭṭhāti, dvādhiṭṭhitaṁ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa
tika-vin05t13:2_13: vissāsā gaṇhāti, suggahitaṁ. Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṁ pahiṇati “imaṁ cīvaraṁ
tika-vin05t13:2_14: itthannāmassa dammī”ti. So antarāmagge suṇāti “yassa pahīyati, so kālakato”ti, tassa
tika-vin05t13:2_15: matakacīvaraṁ adhiṭṭhāti, svādhiṭṭhitaṁ. Yo pahiṇati, tassa vissāsā gaṇhāti, duggahitaṁ.
tika-vin05t13:2_16: Bhikkhu bhikkhussa hatthe cīvaraṁ pahiṇati “imaṁ cīvaraṁ itthannāmassa dammī”ti.
tika-vin05t13:2_17: So antarāmagge suṇāti “ubho kālakatā”ti. Yo pahiṇati, tassa matakacīvaraṁ adhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin05t13:2_18: dvādhiṭṭhitaṁ. Yassa pahīyati, tassa matakacīvaraṁ adhiṭṭhāti, svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
tika-vin05t13:3_0: Pariccajitvā dinnaṁ puna kenaci kāraṇena kupito āharāpetuṁ na labhati. Attanā dinnampi
tika-vin05t13:3_1: hi cīvaraṁ sakasaññāya acchindato nissaggiyaṁ, aññaṁ parikkhāraṁ antamaso sūcimpi
tika-vin05t13:3_2: acchindato dukkaṭaṁ. Sace pana “bhante, tumhākaṁ idaṁ sāruppa”nti sayameva deti,
tika-vin05t13:3_3: gahetuṁ vaṭṭati. Atha pana “āvuso, mayaṁ tuyhaṁ ‘vattapaṭivattaṁ karissati, amhākaṁ
tika-vin05t13:3_4: santike upajjhaṁ gaṇhissati, dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇissatī’ti cīvaraṁ adamhā, so dāni tvaṁ
tika-vin05t13:3_5: na vattaṁ karosi, na upajjhaṁ gaṇhāsi, na dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāsī”ti evamādīni vutto
tika-vin05t13:3_6: “bhante, cīvaratthāya maññe bhaṇatha, idaṁ vo cīvara”nti deti, evampi vaṭṭati. Disāpakkamantaṁ
tika-vin05t13:3_7: vā pana daharaṁ “nivattetha na”nti bhaṇati, so na nivattati, cīvare gahetvā nirundhathāti,
tika-vin05t13:3_8: evañce nivattati, sādhu. Sace “pattacīvaratthāya maññe tumhe bhaṇatha, gaṇhatha na”nti
tika-vin05t13:3_9: deti, evampi vaṭṭati. Vibbhamantaṁ vā disvā “mayaṁ tuyhaṁ ‘vattaṁ karissatī’ti pattacīvaraṁ
tika-vin05t13:3_10: adamhā, so dāni tvaṁ vibbhamitvā carasī”ti vadati, itaro “gaṇhatha tumhākaṁ pattacīvara”nti
tika-vin05t13:3_11: deti, evampi vaṭṭati. “Mama santike upajjhaṁ gaṇhantasseva demi, aññattha gaṇhantassa
tika-vin05t13:3_12: na demi, vattaṁ karontasseva demi, akarontassa na demi, dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇantasseva
tika-vin05t13:3_13: demi, apariyāpuṇantassa na demi, avibbhamantasseva demi, vibbhamantassa na demī”ti
tika-vin05t13:3_14: evaṁ pana dātuṁ na vaṭṭati, dadato dukkaṭaṁ, āharāpetuṁ pana vaṭṭati, vissajjetvā
tika-vin05t13:3_15: dinnaṁ acchinditvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Ayaṁ tāva dāne vinicchayo.
tika-vin05t13:5: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa vissāsaṁ gahetuṁ sandiṭṭho ca hoti, sambhatto ca, ālapito ca, jīvati ca, gahite ca attamano hotī”ti.
tika-vin05t13:6_0: Tattha sandiṭṭhoti diṭṭhamattakamitto. Sambhattoti daḷhamitto. Ālapitoti “mama santakaṁ
tika-vin05t13:6_1: yaṁ icchasi, taṁ gaṇheyyāsi, āpucchitvā gahaṇe kāraṇaṁ natthī”ti vutto. Jīvatīti
tika-vin05t13:6_2: anuṭṭhānaseyyāya sayitopi yāvajīvitindriyupacchedaṁ na pāpuṇāti. Gahite ca attamanoti
tika-vin05t13:6_3: gahite tuṭṭhacitto hoti. “Evarūpassa santakaṁ gahite me attamano bhavissatī”ti jānantena
tika-vin05t13:6_4: gahetuṁ vaṭṭati. Anavasesapariyādānavasena cetāni pañcaṅgāni vuttāni, vissāsaggāho
tika-vin05t13:6_5: pana tīhi aṅgehi ruhati sandiṭṭho, jīvati, gahite attamano, sambhatto, jīvati, gahite
tika-vin05t13:6_6: attamano, ālapito, jīvati, gahite attamanoti. Yo pana na jīvati, na ca gahite attamano
tika-vin05t13:6_7: hoti, tassa santakaṁ vissāsaggāhena gahitampi puna dātabbaṁ. Dadamānena ca matakadhanaṁ
tika-vin05t13:6_8: tāva ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā, tesaṁ dātabbaṁ. Anattamanassa
tika-vin05t13:6_9: santakaṁ tasseva dātabbaṁ, yo pana paṭhamaṁyeva “suṭṭhu kataṁ tayā mama santakaṁ
tika-vin05t13:6_10: gaṇhantenā”ti vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā anumoditvā pacchā kenaci kāraṇena
tika-vin05t13:6_11: kupito, paccāharāpetuṁ na labhati, yopi adātukāmo, cittena pana adhivāseti, na kiñci
tika-vin05t13:6_12: vadati, sopi puna paccāharāpetuṁ na labhati. Yo pana “mayā tumhākaṁ santakaṁ gahitaṁ
tika-vin05t13:6_13: vā paribhuttaṁ vā”ti vutte “gahitaṁ vā hotu paribhuttaṁ vā, mayā pana taṁ kenacideva
tika-vin05t13:6_14: karaṇīyena ṭhapitaṁ, taṁ pākatikaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭatī”ti vadati, ayaṁ paccāharāpetuṁ labhati.
tika-vin05t13:7_0: 71.Lābhassa pariṇāmananti idaṁ pana aññesaṁ atthāya pariṇatalābhassa attano aññassa
tika-vin05t13:7_1: vā pariṇāmanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Tatrāyaṁ vinicchayo – saṅghassa pariṇataṁ sahadhammikānaṁ
tika-vin05t13:7_2: vā gihīnaṁ vā antamaso mātusantakampi “idaṁ mayhaṁ dehī”ti saṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṁ
tika-vin05t13:7_3: ñatvā attano pariṇāmetvā gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ, “imassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti
tika-vin05t13:7_4: evaṁ aññassa pariṇāmentassa suddhikapācittiyaṁ. Tasmā yopi vassikasāṭikasamaye mātugharepi
tika-vin05t13:7_5: saṅghassa pariṇataṁ vassikasāṭikaṁ ñatvā attano pariṇāmeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ,
tika-vin05t13:7_6: parassa pariṇāmeti, suddhikapācittiyaṁ. Manussā “saṅghabhattaṁ karissāmā”ti sappitelādīni
tika-vin05t13:7_7: āharanti, gilāno cepi bhikkhusaṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṁ ñatvā kiñci yācati, nissaggiyaṁ
tika-vin05t13:7_8: pācittiyameva. Sace pana so “tumhākaṁ sappiādīni ābhatāni atthī”ti pucchitvā “āma,
tika-vin05t13:7_9: atthī”ti vutte “mayhampi dethā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Athāpi naṁ kukkuccāyantaṁ upāsakā
tika-vin05t13:7_10: vadanti “saṅghopi amhehi dinnameva labhati, gaṇhatha, bhante”ti, evampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t13:8_0: Ekasmiṁ vihāre saṅghassa pariṇataṁ aññavihāraṁ uddisitvā “asukasmiṁ nāma vihāre saṅghassa
tika-vin05t13:8_1: dethā”ti pariṇāmeti, “kiṁ saṅghassa dānena, cetiyassa pūjaṁ karothā”ti evaṁ cetiyassa
tika-vin05t13:8_2: vā pariṇāmeti, dukkaṭaṁ. Cetiyassa pariṇataṁ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā gaṇassa
tika-vin05t13:8_3: vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, dukkaṭameva. Niyametvā aññacetiyassa atthāya ropitamālāvacchato
tika-vin05t13:8_4: aññacetiyamhi pupphampi āropetuṁ na vaṭṭati, ekassa cetiyassa pana chattaṁ vā paṭākaṁ
tika-vin05t13:8_5: vā āropetvā ṭhitaṁ disvā sesaṁ aññacetiyassa dāpetuṁ vaṭṭati. Antamaso sunakhassapi
tika-vin05t13:8_6: pariṇataṁ “imassa sunakhassa mā dehi, etassa dehī”ti evaṁ aññapuggalassa pariṇāmeti,
tika-vin05t13:8_7: dukkaṭaṁ. Sace pana dāyakā “mayaṁ saṅghabhattaṁ kātukāmā, cetiyapūjaṁ kātukāmā, ekassa
tika-vin05t13:8_8: bhikkhuno parikkhāraṁ dātukāmā, tumhākaṁ ruciyā dassāma, bhaṇatha kattha demā”ti
tika-vin05t13:8_9: vadanti, evaṁ vutte tena bhikkhunā “yattha icchatha, tattha dethā”ti vattabbā. Sace
tika-vin05t13:8_10: pana kevalaṁ “kattha demā”ti pucchanti, “yattha tumhākaṁ deyyadhammo paribhogaṁ vā
tika-vin05t13:8_11: labheyya, paṭisaṅkhāraṁ vā labheyya, ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa, yattha vā pana tumhākaṁ
tika-vin05t13:8_12: cittaṁ pasīdati, tattha dethā”ti vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
